Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide-Peptoid Hybrids with and without Membrane Disruption.
Literature.Author: Bonvin E, Personne H, Paschoud T, Reusser J, Gan BH, Luscher A, Köhler T, van Delden C, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=>2000 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=>200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14 4.18(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14 4.18(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae Oxa-48(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae Oxa-48(MIC=32µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=8µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=8µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2µg/ml)
